TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the pizza tastes like dirt

I wish this post does not get a single reply in the next hour. (impossible?) (if you comment before, then it did not get granted, if if you wait an hour it would be granted and not corrupted)

 

Edited April 6, 2016 by Q-ver KSP
misspelled, better idea

Granted. It comes though the printer instead.

i wish that my ksp cruise missile actually worked.

Granted, it worked it's way into your home and detonated.

 

I wish for moar stock SSTO Spaceplane rated engine

Granted, but they are only for looks.

I wish I had KSP on Steam.

Granted, but your steam train gets away with your ksp.

i wish that people replied more to forum games.
Granted, but you are then banned for being so demand-y when the current rate at which people reply is completely fine.

17 minutes ago, DolphinDude3 said:

Granted, but you are then banned for being so demand-y when the current rate at which people reply is completely fine.

Granted, but you didn't have a wish.

I wish I had 50 likes instead of 25.

Granted, but something bad happens because your posts and rep are both divisible by 60.

and I suppose I am a little demand-y.

i wish that @DolphinDude3 stopped doing what I used to do.

(Over posting, posting sprees, and saying stuff like that)

Granted, but none of your posts are liked ever again to keep your likes at 50.

 

I wish I remembered to have a wish each time I post on this thread.

Granted, but you forget about me ninja'ing your posts.

i wish that someone replied to ban the user above you.

Granted, they hurt your feels.

 

I wish for moar stock functional and good looking SSTO Spaceplane Jet Engines.

51 minutes ago, max_creative said:

Granted, but something bad happens because your posts and rep are both divisible by 60.

and I suppose I am a little demand-y.

i wish that @DolphinDude3 stopped doing what I used to do.

(Over posting, posting sprees, and saying stuff like that)

BTW u post spree a lot. 566 posts n 166 rep?

Granted, but they overheat really fast. 

I wish you didn't make such a confusing post in ban the user above you.

Granted. They have the efficiency of solid rockets.

I wish for a can of Pepsi.

Granted, but there was a small breach in the can so the soda is flat.

I wish for more time away from school.

Granted, but you get to torture zones instead.

I wish KSP files would never get corrupted.

Granted, but they do because the point of this is to corrupt your wish.

I wish my cruise missile actually worked.

It works but after you finish using it, it destroys the whole space center and makes the kraken destroy your ships a soon as you lunch because he is feeling nice.

I wish for a 17x17x17 rubies cube.

Granted but it gets shipped to Antarctica. 

I wish I didn't get so many rule 2.3 posting infractions.

Granted. Your posts become more meaningful, don't get a rise from users, don't use reaction images/videos, don't change the topic of the thread, don't ask about future releases, and don't ask for modders to update their mods to be compatible with the newest version of KSP (the newest rule, by the way).

I wish IRC wasn't so stupid.

Granted, but I don't know what that is.

I wish that YouTube wasn't blocked at school.

Granted, but all other sites are banned everywhere.

I wish all mods were compatible with the Engineering Tech Tree.

Granted, but you get stuck in a loop and run out of funds.

I wish my castle in Minecraft would just be done already.

Granted, but it's made out of wool.

BTW I also play Minecraft! 

I wish that 1.9 would download on our computer.

Granted, but all other games are permanently uninstalled.

 

I wish I could actually build a decent Cruiser in Space Engineers.

Granted. You immediately encounter an even better cruiser and are destroyed.

 

I wish that I could understand Calculus.

Edited April 7, 2016 by Vaporo
